title: Magic Mansion
description: Professor Topaz is tired of fending off advice that he should retire in Vegas where magicians his age have an easier time finding work.Ricardo Hart's career has sunk so low, he's resorted to shaking his moneymaker at bachelorette parties.But there's a casting call for a new reality show called Magic Mansion that could change everything for these two gay stage magicians, one recovering from the loss of his partner, the other awe-struck by the presence of his idol. Each is poised for a critical second chance: at fame, and at love.Who will win? Step into the Mansion, and find out....(Gay Romance)
author: Jordan Castillo Price
